Material used.Description: Neuroblastoma cell lines were transfected with normal or mutant α-synuclein plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: Downregulation of genes involved in synaptic function and upregulation of stress-response genes in A30P-expressing cells.
Altered expression of mitochondrial and lysosomal pathway genes in A53T-expressing cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Gene expression within ±20% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Gene expression deviating by >30% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Selected genes were validated using qRT-PCR after microarray analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: Significant downregulation of SNCA target genes in A30P-expressing cells (p < 0.01).
Altered expression of lysosomal genes in A53T-expressing cells (p < 0.05).

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Gene expression within ±20% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Gene expression deviating by >30% from wild-type levels.
